message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I believe it's a great deal for you, given its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $8,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our continued negotiation,  $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to meet you halfway. Let's close this deal!
